byline: By XX | NJ Advance Media for leighvalleylive.com

content.value: If someone drove from the Easton-Phillipsburg free bridge westbound for the entire span of Route 248 in Northampton County, they will have passed through perhaps every voter bloc in America. We want to create an interactive map that would illustrate this while also providing a comprehensive understanding of the county's history and culture. (Introduction of the project. TKTK. )
